member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprModal.Footer
member.summary: HTML content to show on the Modal footer (bottom). Can be any valid HTML but should be only custom action buttons. Must not be defined if you want to leave it out.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprModal.OverlayBackgroundColor
member.summary: Sets the style of the HTML div background-color. Use HTML specified: Color Names, RGB, HEX or with HSL values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprModal.OverlayOpacity
member.summary: Opacity of the overlay div. Value should be between 0..1. Where 0 means the overlay layer is not visible.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprModal.ConsentDetails
member.summary: GDPR Cookies consent details. An enumerable list of Cookie types with Accepted flag.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprModal.AnswerValidUntil
member.summary: Gets or Sets Consent choice validity date. After this date Consent will be asked again.

member.summary: Modal dialog window Height in px if set to 0 Height is set auto.

member.summary: Modal dialog window Width in px if set to 0 Width is set auto.

member.summary: Modal dialog window minimum Height in px.

member.summary: Modal dialog window minimum Width in px.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprModal.Centered
member.summary: When true Modal dialog will be vertically centered, otherwise shown near to the top. Modal dialog horizontally always centered.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.GdprConsent.GdprModal.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Arbitrary HTML attributes e.g.: tabindex="1" will be passed to the corresponding rendered HTML element.
